dcterms:description: A dynamic QA benchmark evaluating LLMs on questions requiring current world knowledge and those with false premises, measuring correctness and hallucination.
dcterms:title: FreshQA

dcterms:description: A framework that guides models in utilizing external knowledge while constraining reasoning to reliable information, mitigating hallucinations.
dcterms:title: ChitChatQA

dcterms:creator: Haoqiang Kang
Juntong Ni
Huaxiu Yao
dcterms:description: A framework that employs real-time verification and rectification during the generation process to detect and correct hallucinations.
dcterms:title: EVER

dcterms:description: A model-agnostic system that automates the attribution process for any text generation model, enhancing trustworthiness.
dcterms:title: RARR

Tiezheng Yu

dcterms:description: A methodology that integrates knowledge acquisition and answer generation to systematically improve the factuality and consistency of generated answers.
dcterms:title: Self-Reflection Methodology

dcterms:description: A dataset that aligns input facts with original and counterfactual descriptions at the word level, promoting faithful knowledge-to-text generation.
dcterms:title: FATE
